name: Cat Dungeon Escape
description:
Cat Dungeon Escape is a challenger Puzzle Game !!



Rotate the Scene and invert the gravity for to get the key , open the door and escape !!
With several traps along the way, this can be more difficult than you think !!!



CHALLENGING PUZZLE
To take the key will be not so simple !! Fire traps , spikes , portals and more are waiting for you !!



GAMEPLAY
The Gameplay is really simple and easy !! Use the keys "A" and "D" to rotate screen and "SPACE" to invert gravity !!!




FEATURES
  • Manipulate gravity
  • Rotate scene
  • Easy gameplay
  • The challenge increases with each level
  • Pixel Art Game
  • Challenging Puzzle
